ExampleDefinition.Description:
This example demonstrates how to create a Histogram with Labels on columns in SciChart. This is achieved by combining the [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20Column%20Series%20Type.html']FastColumnRenderableSeries[/url] with a custom modifier which creates [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20TextAnnotation%20Type.html']TextAnnotation[/url] and positions them over the individual columns.
Take a look at the source-code to see how we've achieved this.
